item.title: Archtecture Keywords
item.description: HBM & DDR & SDRAM & DRAM https://m.huxiu.com/article/3047123.html HBM (High Bandwidth Memory) Defination: It has stacked DRAM architecture with core DRAM dies on top of a base logic die, based on the TSV and die stacking technologies. Technology[edit] Type Release Max data rate speed per pin(Gbit/s) Stack per Stack per Stack - - - - Max capacity(Number of dies Ã— Die capacity = GByte) Max data rate(GByte/s) HBM 1 Oct
